meta.description: I was so grateful for the assurance that because God loves and cares for each one of us as His child, I was naturally immune to this or any virus.

title: Persistence brings complete healing of COVID / Christian Science Sentinel
cleaned_text:
Last summer, my husband, who is not a Christian Scientist and who is fully vaccinated against COVID-19, was experiencing what he thought was a slight head cold. Since he was to compete in a national rowing regatta in a few days, he thought it was wise to get tested for COVID at a nearby clinic, where he tested positive.

I hadn’t been feeling quite normal myself for several days, but hadn’t been concerned at all. When my husband described his symptoms, however, I could have ticked off almost all of them in relation to my own. He was then sure that I had COVID, too, and we knew we needed to isolate ourselves in our condo. My husband canceled his plans to participate in the regatta.

opengraph.title: Persistence brings complete healing of COVID / Christian Science Sentinel
opengraph.description: I was so grateful for the assurance that because God loves and cares for each one of us as His child, I was naturally immune to this or any virus.
